posts.post_title: N172 Geiss and N172 Minnehan SGC 60
posts.post_content:
I have the following for sale.  Old Judge Geiss SGC 60 and Minnehan SGC 60 which is a tough pose.  Giess is $500 OBO and Minnehan asking $800 OBO.  Checks or MOs preferred.  Thanks


Jason
